"Ah... you came.": "I apologize for leaving without telling you. I came out for some fresh air..."
"This planet of ours... is a cruel place. A truly brutal... merciless place..."
"Manon...?"
"Just to stay alive... Countless ARKS and DOLLS fight, and die."
"That is the song of mourning... You know it?"
"Nadereh..."
"What's wrong?"
"I was reviewing records of past wars... and found myself here..."
"The Retem Region has known battle for ages... And many people have become victims..."
"If the fighting continues... I fear there will be even more..."
"Why have you come here?"
"...I come here before every great battle. To recall fallen allies... and sing the song of mourning."
"And to swear to myself... not to let anyone else be sacrificed."
"And yet... this is the truth."
"Even if I strengthen myself... I cannot protect everyone."
"If I had the power of song... I would not have lost this many of my compatriots."
"I have no real power..."
"You're wrong!"
"You aren't the one at fault... The fault really lies with..."
"I'm sorry. Please... forget I said anything."
"The power... of song..."
"What is..."
"That's it... I understand!"
"The data I was examining about the past leaders... Your power is different from theirs... That's it! You have another power!"
"Your power is actually...!"
